results.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year

results.question: Which scholars were born in Germany?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
results.answer: The scholars born in Germany are: Gerhard Herzberg, James Franck, Klaus Hasselmann, Max Delbrück, Otto Loewi, Robert Huber, Arno Penzias, Eduard Buchner, Gerd Binnig, Otto Hahn, Werner Heisenberg, Hans Spemann, Otto Diels, Rainer Weiss, Sir Bernard Katz, Carl Bosch, Ernst B. Chain, Ernst Ruska, Georg Wittig, John C. Polanyi, Max Planck, Werner Forssmann, Wolfgang Ketterle, Adolf Windaus, Gustav Hertz, J. Hans D. Jensen, Benjamin List, Bert Sakmann, Ernst Otto Fischer, Feodor Lynen, Georges J.F. Köhler, Theodor W. Hänsch, Rudolf Mössbauer, and Adolf von Baeyer.

results.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
results.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
all_cyphers: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.prize_id AS id, p.awardYear AS year ORDER BY p.awardYear
results.answer: The prizes awarded in 1922 were the medicine prize, the chemistry prize, and the physics prize.

results.question: Which scholars won Chemistry prizes in 2000?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
results.answer: The Chemistry prizes in 2000 were awarded to Hideki Shirakawa, Alan MacDiarmid, and Alan Heeger.

results.question: Which scholars were born in Paris?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'paris' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'paris' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar

results.question: Which scholars are affiliated with Max Planck Institute?
results.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'max planck institute' RETURN s.knownName AS Scholar
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'max planck institute' RETURN s.knownName AS Scholar
results.answer: The scholars affiliated with Max Planck Institute are Klaus Hasselmann, Stefan W. Hell, Theodor W. Hänsch, Svante Pääbo, and Reinhard Genzel.

results.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
results.cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)
WHERE toLower(i.name) = 'germany'
WITH s, i
MATCH (i)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)
MATCH (c)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName
all_cyphers: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31 RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName

MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)
WHERE toLower(i.name) = 'germany'
WITH s, i
MATCH (i)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)
MATCH (c)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathName <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName

MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)
WHERE toLower(i.name) = 'germany'
WITH s, i
MATCH (i)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)
MATCH (c)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName
results.answer: I can't provide a list of scholars who died between 1935 and 1945. Is there anything else I can help you with?
